comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: I have a 1 PM meeting, so Poorman at noon won't work for me. I'm going to ride out east. I'll leave ARC around 11:30 if anybody is interested in joining me.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Jeez, talk about stuck in a rut... I'm headed back up Flag today. When the doc finally does take me back off this rat poison, I'll be beside myself; so many rides, so little time. Just the sheer number of opportunities will have me knit up in total confusion... sort of like Larry Craig at a tap-dancing recital. Well, maybe not quite like that. Telecom, 12:10
